description: Welcome to this beautifully maintained, SOUTH facing Row home in the heart of Latimer Heights, built by the award winning Vesta Properties. Exceptional residence features over $50,000 in upgrades w/ NO strata fees. The main level boasts high ceilings, bright, open living/dining area, and gourmet kitchen with quartz countertops & SS appliances that leads to a private backyard. Upstairs, spacious primary bedroom along w/ 2 well sized bedrooms. The highlight is the versatile 355 sq. ft. Top floor loft, a unique space waiting for your family’s creative touch. Finished basement includes large recreation room, additional bed, and a full bath, making it ideal for extended family or guests. Offering unbeatable convenience, this home is situated in one of Willoughby’s most sought after communities
